description: Evangeline Athanasia Kitty McDowell is a student in 2-A, but also an ageless, centuries-old, true-blooded vampire on whom the Thousand Master, http://anidb.net/ch11898 [Nagi Springfield], used a powerful curse. Now that his young and inexperienced son, http://anidb.net/ch4675 [Negi Springfield], is close at hand as her homeroom teacher, she sets out to draw his blood in order to lift the curse, which binds her to Mahora Academy perpetually and keeps her from exercising her enormous magical powers.
name: Evangeline Athanasia Kitty McDowell
